The navbar above is one component of four that make up Shoedidas, a student project to replicate a product page from adidas.com.

You can see the whole project in production and on github.

Note: The heart of this component is the search functionality. The database contains product records for shoes, pants, hoodies, etc!

Here is see a cached version of the product page we are replicating. (Not all javascript works fully in the cached version, so, if you are reading this close to Novermber 2018, just head over to adidas to check out the live version!
